mapper.insert: insert into wms_detect_storage ( DETECT_GOODID, DETECT_BATCHID, DETECT_REPOSITORY, DETECT_NUMBER, DETECT_PASSED, DETECT_SCRATCH, DETECT_DAMAGE ) values ( #{goodsID}, #{batchID}, #{repositoryID}, #{number}, #{passed}, #{scratch}, #{damage} )
mapper.delete: delete from wms_detect_storage where DETECT_GOODID = #{goodsID} and wms_detect_storage.DETECT_BATCHID = #{batchID} and wms_detect_storage.DETECT_REPOSITORY = #{repositoryID}
